fields.name: AttachedTo
fields.description: The list of resource IDs that attach the volume. It may include virtual machines and Hybrid AKS clusters.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The more detailed status of the volume.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the volume.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The unique identifier of the volume.

fields.name: SizeMiB
fields.description: The size of the allocation for this volume in Mebibytes.
